item.title: 0101. Symmetric Tree
item.description: Description # Given the root of a binary tree, check whether it is a mirror of itself (i.e., symmetric around its center). Solutions # Recursive # 简单题，左子树的左节点的值要等于右子树的右子树的右节点的值，左子树的右节点的值要等于右子树的左节点的值。 func isSymmetric(root *TreeNode) bool { return helper(root, root) } func helper(root1, root2 *TreeNode) bool { if root1 == nil && root2 == nil { return true } if root1 == nil || root2 == nil { return false } if root1.Val != root2.
